		[dateClientEffective],
		[dateEffective],

		[employmentType],

		[payRate],

	[placementID]
 FROM

SELECT [id]
      ,[displayName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [displayName]), 2)
      ,[firstName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [firstName]), 2)
      ,[lastName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [lastName]), 2)
      ,[jobTitle]
      ,[workPhone]
      ,[mobilePhone]
      ,[workEmail] =
		CASE WHEN COALESCE([workEmail], '') = ''
				THEN [workEmail]
			 WHEN CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) = 0
			 	THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER([workEmail])), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
			 ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(LOWER([workEmail]), CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) - 1)), 2),
			 		CASE WHEN RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail])) = 'avenga.com' 
			 				THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
			 			 ELSE RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) + 1)
			 		END) 
		END
      ,[location]
      ,[division]
      ,[supervisor] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [supervisor]), 2)
      ,[department]
  FROM [PL_BambooHR_AITP].[Employees]

SELECT [id]
      ,[displayName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [displayName]), 2)
      ,[firstName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [firstName]), 2)
      ,[lastName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [lastName]), 2)
      ,[jobTitle]
      ,[workPhone]
      ,[mobilePhone]
      ,[workEmail] =
		CASE WHEN COALESCE([workEmail], '') = ''
				THEN [workEmail]
			WHEN CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) = 0
				THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER([workEmail])), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
			ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(LOWER([workEmail]), CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) - 1)), 2),
					CASE WHEN RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail])) = 'avenga.com' 
							THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
						ELSE RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) + 1)
					END) 
		END
      ,[location]
      ,[division]
      ,[supervisor] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [supervisor]), 2)
      ,[department]
  FROM [DE_BambooHR_ADACH].[Employees]

SELECT [id]
      ,[displayName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [displayName]), 2)
      ,[firstName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [firstName]), 2)
      ,[lastName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [lastName]), 2)
      ,[jobTitle]
      ,[workPhone]
      ,[mobilePhone]
      ,[workEmail] =
		CASE WHEN COALESCE([workEmail], '') = ''
				THEN [workEmail]
			 WHEN CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) = 0
			 	THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER([workEmail])), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
			 ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(LOWER([workEmail]), CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) - 1)), 2),
			 		CASE WHEN RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail])) = 'avenga.com' 
			 				THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
			 			 ELSE RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) + 1)
			 		END) 
		END
      ,[location]
      ,[division]
      ,[supervisor] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [supervisor]), 2)
      ,[department]
  FROM [PL_BambooHR_SDC].[Employees]

SELECT
	[Id]
	,[FirstName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [FirstName]), 2) 
	,[LastName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [LastName]), 2) 
	,[MiddleName]
	,[Birthday]
	,[SkypeName] = CONCAT('SkypeName', CAST([Id] AS NVARCHAR))
	,[IdBranch]
	,[IdPosition]
	,[Email] = 
		CASE WHEN COALESCE([Email], '') = ''
				THEN [Email]
			 WHEN CHARINDEX('@', [Email]) = 0
			 	THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER([Email])), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
			 ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(LOWER([Email]), CHARINDEX('@', [Email]) - 1)), 2),
			 		CASE WHEN RIGHT([Email], LEN([Email]) - CHARINDEX('@', [Email])) = 'avenga.com' 
			 				THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
			 			 ELSE RIGHT([Email], LEN([Email]) - CHARINDEX('@', [Email]) + 1)
			 		END) 
		END
	,[PhoneNumber]
	,[StartDate]
	,[IsActive]
	,[UserLogin] = CONCAT('UserLogin', CAST([Id] AS NVARCHAR))
	,[IdSuperior]
	,[PictureFileName] = CONCAT('PictureFileName', CAST([Id] AS NVARCHAR))
	,[GraphId]
	,[Nickname] = CONCAT('Nickname', CAST([Id] AS NVARCHAR))
	--,[SittingAreaId]
	,[FullName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [FullName]), 2) 
	,[Gender]
	,[GitHubUserName] = CONCAT('GitHubUserName', CAST([Id] AS NVARCHAR))
	,[Billable]
	,[TechnologyId]
	,[EmploymentType]
	,[Address] = CONCAT('Address', CAST([Id] AS NVARCHAR))
	,[TshirtSize]
	,[HasDriverLicense]
	,[IsSuperiorPeak]
	,[HrPartnerId]
	,[CreatedOn]
	,[ModifiedOn]
	,[DeletedOn]
	,[ModifiedBy]
	,[CreatedBy]
FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[Employee]

SELECT
	[Id]
	,[PeriodId]
	,[StartDate]
	,[ProductFamily]
	,[CurrencyIsoCode]
	,[QuotaAmount] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([QuotaAmount], 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 900000) + 100000 ELSE 0 END
	,[QuotaQuantity]
	,[QuotaOwnerId]
	,[IsQuantity]
	,[IsAmount]
	,[CreatedDate]
	,[CreatedById]
	,[LastModifiedDate]
	,[LastModifiedById]
	,[SystemModstamp]
	,[ForecastingTypeId]
FROM [GLO_Salesforce].[ForecastingQuota]

activities.name: Copy Table from DL into DWH stage

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('IF OBJECT_ID(N''stage.', item().dest_table, ''', N''U'') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE [stage].[', item().dest_table, ']')}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [Konto]
      ,[Gegenkonto]
      ,[Umsatz Soll] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(TRY_PARSE([Umsatz Soll] AS DECIMAL(19, 4) USING 'de-DE'), 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 99000) + 1000 ELSE 0 END
      ,[Umsatz Haben] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(TRY_PARSE([Umsatz Haben] AS DECIMAL(19, 4) USING 'de-DE'), 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 99000) + 1000 ELSE 0 END
      ,[Kurs]
      ,[Belegdatum]
      ,[Belegfeld 1]
      ,[Belegfeld 2]
      ,[Buchungstext]
      ,[Flligkeit]
      ,[KOST1 - Kostenstelle]
      ,[KOST2 - Kostenstelle]
      ,[Steuersatz] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(TRY_PARSE([Steuersatz] AS DECIMAL(19, 4) USING 'de-DE'), 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 99000) + 1000 ELSE 0 END
      ,[EU-Land (Bestimmung)]
      ,[Stapel-Nr.]
      ,[MandantenNr]
      ,[Wirtschaftsjahr]
      ,[Monat]
  FROM [DE_datalakesftp].[RAW_DATEV_ACC_AVG_2021]

SELECT [Konto]
      ,[Gegenkonto]
      ,[Umsatz Soll] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(TRY_PARSE([Umsatz Soll] AS DECIMAL(19, 4) USING 'de-DE'), 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 99000) + 1000 ELSE 0 END
      ,[Umsatz Haben] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(TRY_PARSE([Umsatz Haben] AS DECIMAL(19, 4) USING 'de-DE'), 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 99000) + 1000 ELSE 0 END
      ,[Kurs]
      ,[Belegdatum]
      ,[Belegfeld 1]
      ,[Belegfeld 2]
      ,[Buchungstext]
      ,[Flligkeit]
      ,[KOST1 - Kostenstelle]
      ,[KOST2 - Kostenstelle]
      ,[Steuersatz] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(TRY_PARSE([Steuersatz] AS DECIMAL(19, 4) USING 'de-DE'), 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 99000) + 1000 ELSE 0 END
      ,[EU-Land (Bestimmung)]
      ,[Stapel-Nr.]
      ,[MandantenNr]
      ,[Wirtschaftsjahr]
      ,[Monat]
  FROM [DE_datalakesftp].[RAW_DATEV_ACC_AVD_2021]

SELECT
	 [GroupID]
    ,[MemberID]
    ,[Email] =
		CASE
			WHEN [MemberType] = 'USER' 
				THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT([Email], CHARINDEX('@', [Email]) - 1)), 2),
					CASE
						WHEN RIGHT([Email], LEN([Email]) - CHARINDEX('@', [Email])) = 'avenga.com' THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
						ELSE RIGHT([Email], LEN([Email]) - CHARINDEX('@', [Email]) + 1)
					END)
			ELSE [Email]
		END
    ,[MemberRole]
    ,[MemberType]
    ,[MemberStatus]
    ,[Etag]
FROM [gsuite].[GoogleGroupMembers]

activities.name: Get_GSA_PrivateKey
activities.description: Get google service account private key

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT GroupID
FROM [gsuite].[GoogleGroups]
WHERE DirectMembersCount <> '0'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
       [userID]
      ,[email] = 
			CASE WHEN COALESCE([firstName], '') != '' AND COALESCE([lastName], '') != ''
					THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER(CONCAT([firstName], '.', [lastName]))), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
				 ELSE NULL
			END
      ,[email2]
      ,[email3]
      ,[firstName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [firstName]), 2)
      ,[lastName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [lastName]), 2)
      ,[occupation]
  FROM [PL_Bullhorn_dbo].[CorporateUser]

DECLARE @agroup TABLE ([ProjectID] nvarchar(100), [rID] integer)

INSERT INTO @agroup ([ProjectID], [rID])
SELECT
	[ProjectID] = LEFT(g.rName, CHARINDEX('_', g.rName)-1)
	,[rID]
FROM projectile.agroup g
WHERE SUBSTRING(g.rName, CHARINDEX('_', g.rName)+1, LEN(g.rName)) = 'ProjectManagers'

DECLARE @axref TABLE (sysDocument nvarchar(100), sysValue nvarchar(100))

INSERT INTO @axref (sysDocument, sysValue)
SELECT
	sysDocument = RIGHT(r.sysDocument ,CHARINDEX('|',REVERSE(r.sysDocument))-1)
	,sysValue = RIGHT(r.sysValue ,CHARINDEX('|',REVERSE(r.sysValue))-1)
FROM projectile.axref r
WHERE r.sysCollection = 'Users'

SELECT
	g.[ProjectID]
	,[ProjectManager] = STRING_AGG(CONCAT(e.pName, ' ', e.pFirstName), '; ')
FROM @agroup g
INNER JOIN @axref r ON r.sysDocument = g.rId
INNER JOIN projectile.auser u ON u.rId = r.sysValue
INNER JOIN (SELECT pEmployee, pName, pFirstName FROM projectile.temployee) e ON e.pEmployee = u.rName
GROUP BY g.[ProjectID]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('
SELECT
	ftm.[Id]
	,ftm.[IdEmployee]
	,ftm.[Hours]
	,ftm.[IdCalendar]
	,ftm.[FromTime]
	,ftm.[ToTime]
	,ftm.[CreatedBy]
	,ftm.[IdTMRequest]
	,ftm.[IdFTMType]
	,ftm.[CreatedOn]
	,ftm.[ModifiedOn]
	,ftm.[ModifiedBy]
	,ftm.[DeletedOn]
FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[FreeTimeManagement] ftm
	INNER JOIN [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[Calendar] c ON ftm.IdCalendar = c.Id
WHERE c.[Date] > ''', activity('Get start processing date').output.firstRow.StartDate, ''';')

preCopyScript.value:
@{concat('
DELETE ftm
FROM [stage].[CorebaseFreeTimeManagement] ftm
	INNER JOIN [stage].[CorebaseCalendar] c ON ftm.IdCalendar = c.Id
WHERE c.[Date] > ''', activity('Get start processing date').output.firstRow.StartDate, ''';')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT StartDate = CONVERT(CHAR(10), EOMONTH(DATEADD(month, -', string(pipeline().parameters.MonthBack), ', CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))) , 120);')
